div.p:
To Educate each Student to Achieve
His or Her Full Academic Potential

We see D70 as a place where all children and adults are valued, similarities and
differences are addressed, individuals are respected, and all children are treated as
our most valuable resource and best hope for the future. We see a safe and trusting
environment where children and adults are actively engaged in lifelong learning.
We see a partnership with our schools and communities that flexibly responds to
the educational needs of all learners in an ever-changing world.
